Model Specific Description: This field is used to indicate the material of which the documented instance of artwork consists.
This field is used to indicate the technique used in the construction of the documented instance of artwork.
This field is used to indicate the type of measurement that the dimension of the documented instance of artwork is.
This field is used to indicate the value of the measurement of the documented instance of artwork.
This field is used to indicate the unit used to express the value of the measurement of the documented instance of artwork.
This field is used to indicate the actor who undertook the measurement of the documented instance of built work.
